title: Our Street. Memories of Buccleuch Place
author: Livingston, Josiah.
snippet: household goods were sold by auction, and wesaw the pictures and furniture which had beenso familiar to us carried away on brokers'hurleys. One long panoramic picture ofMayence and its bridge of boats stood longin a broker's shop near the end of WestNicolson Street. The house was dividedafter that, Nos.
